title: Music:SyhthpopMainLobbyMusicLoops Vol.1
longDescription:
This product is a high-quality synth-pop music loop set that can be used for various projects such as games, movies, and animations. It includes 10 high-quality synth-pop music loops that are suitable for repetitive scenes such as a game's main lobby, inventory, store, and loading screen.


The set is divided into loop versions that allow the music to be repeated and track versions that include outros. By providing these different versions, creators can effectively express the intended effects in their projects.


By using this product, all audio-related issues in the project can be completely resolved, allowing creators to enhance the overall quality of their projects. This product can be used in various fields such as games, movies, and animations, which can increase the project's quality and completeness.

technicalDetails:

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100Hz, 24bit-Depth, 320Kbps, HQ Audio

Lufs / TruePeak : 0~16dBFS, 0~3dBTP, Mastered

Does music loop: Yes

Supported Development Platforms: All

Windows: Yes
